headline: Benchmark and Jefferies Stay Bullish on Expand Energy (EXE)
summary: Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) is one of the 12 Best American Energy Stocks to Buy Now. On January 14, Benchmark reaffirmed its Buy rating on Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) with a price target of $112. The firm identified Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) as its top exploration and production pick for 2026. Benchmark noted that the […]

headline: Is 2027 Oversupply Risk Altering The Investment Case For Expand Energy (EXE)?
summary: On January 6, 2026, Expand Energy’s CEO Nick Dell’Osso presented at the Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech & Utilities Conference in Florida, outlining the company’s role as a major U.S. natural gas producer formed from the 2024 Chesapeake–Southwestern merger. At the same time, analysts have become more cautious about the sector’s outlook, flagging a potential natural gas oversupply in 2027 and weaker pricing that could pressure Expand Energy’s operations and planning. We’ll now examine how...
